type: Roofing and siding and sheet metal services
department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
description: Replaced roof on The AAFC Building 20, which is situated in Ottawa, Ontario. Work included replacing existing roof finishes, roof flashing on parapets, roof dividers and fume hoods. Timeframe: 20 weeks.
full_summary:
=====================

**Building 20-Roof Replacement (EP008-240183)**

**Tender Details:**

* **Reference Number:** WS4110508768-Doc4146015626
* **Solicitation Number:** WS4110508768
* **Publication Date:** August 14, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date and Time:** September 12, 2023 2:00:00 PM

**Project Overview:**

This request for proposals is for the roof replacement of Building 20 at Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada (AAFC), located in Ottawa, Ontario. The project aims to replace approximately 2,343 square meters of existing roof finishes, including the replacement of roof flashing on parapets, roof dividers, and fume hoods. All roof drains will be replaced with new retro-fit flanges and baskets. The contract is expected to be awarded on September 12, 2023, with the work to be completed within 20 weeks thereafter.

**Tender Evaluation:**

The tender will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Additional Information:**

* The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies to this tender.
* National Capital Region (NCR) is the region of opportunity.
* Region of delivery is National Capital Region (NCR).

**Contact:**

For more information, please contact Vani-Machado, Alba (SPAC/PSPC) at alba.vani-machado@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Tender Documents:**

The tender documents can be accessed at: http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17160813?extsite=MTcxNjA4MTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Closing Date and Time:**
